DFA_Toolkit.DFA¶

class DFA_Toolkit.DFA¶

Represents a DFA.

__init__(self: DFA_Toolkit.DFA, states: List[DFA_Toolkit.State], startingState: DFA_Toolkit.State, alphabet: List[str], transitionFunctions: List[DFA_Toolkit.TransitionFunction]) → None¶

constructor

Methods

__init__(self, states, startingState, …)

constructor

addState(self, arg0, arg1)

Adds a State object to the DFA’s states.

describe(self, arg0)

Prints DFA’s details.

getAcceptingStates(self)

Returns DFA’s accepting states as a list of State objects.

Attributes

alphabet

DFA’s alphabet as a list of characters.

startingState

DFA’s starting state as a State object.

states

DFA’s states as a list of State objects.

transitionFunctions

DFA’s transition functions as a list of TransitionFunction objects.
